hero.title: The AI that speaks Bamanankan
hero.subtitle: Ask anything by voice or text. Ekodi understands, thinks, and answers — in Bamanankan.
hero.leitmotiv: Ekodi is here. And it speaks your language.

features.title: What Ekodi can do
features.voice_desc: Speak in Bamanankan or French. Ekodi listens, understands, and responds naturally in Bamanankan — like a conversation.
features.translate_desc: Switch between French and Bamanankan effortlessly. Text in, text out — accurate and fast.
features.tts_desc: Ekodi doesn't just write. It speaks. Natural Bamanankan voice, clear and expressive.
features.api_desc: Add Bamanankan voice and translation to your own apps, bots, or services with a simple API.

api_showcase.title: Integrate Bamanankan AI
api_showcase.subtitle: A simple REST API to bring Bamanankan voice, translation, and intelligence into any application.

story.proverb: Planted before the other ɲiɔ (millet), it grows and surpasses them all.
story.desc: In Bamanankan, Sambala ɲiɔ is the millet sown first — it rises faster and stands taller than the rest. Ekodi carries that spirit: the first AI to truly speak Bamanankan. It is here, and it speaks your language.
